steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ne0g","text":"Start a 10 mL yeast culture and grow to saturation overnight or over 2 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51nd4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o8b0","text":"Note: for p1_wt (but not p1_rec) containing strains, p1 can be lost if grown in YPD for prolonged periods of time (based on my estimations, 2 or 3 1:1000 passages). {"blocks":[{"key":"8jm3o","text":"Optional step for p1 analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8er49","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r673","text":"Cast a 0.75% agarose 1X TAE gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gn3f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kngl","text":"Load ~   gDNA ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ffkf9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qqbg","text":"Run at 85 V for 100+ minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22n0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab2u0","text":"Look for the following bands and no others","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ct5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu66i","text":"p2_wt: 13.5 kb","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17v1v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b66bo","text":"p1_wt (size will be variable depending on landing pad used - for GA-Y319 = 8.9 kb; for GR-Y718 = 5.6 kb)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u4td","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjit","text":"p1_rec (size will be variable = your construct size + 4.6 kb)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"664ii","text":"Note:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k6u6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78nvg","text":"At this step, a \"short\" protocol can be done - it will not produce sufficient DNA for visualization of p1, but is sufficient for PCR amplification from p1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":155}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brq7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftnj7","text":"Recover supernatant and place into a miniprep kit silica column. Wash as per manufacturer instructions or with homemade Wash 1 / Wash 2 buffers, and elute in water or EB. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqkre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bvfg","text":"Note: this short protocol is not suitable for electrophoresis visualization of gDNA and should only be used for PCR amplification from the eluted DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":150}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Yeast gDNA isolation
